short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chromium based browser extension that shows the professor ratings on the registration page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing De-Anza-RMP, a Chrome browser extension / plugin designed to enhance your academic journey. This innovative extension seamlessly integrates professor ratings directly into your registration page, revolutionizing the way students make class selections.

FOOTHILL COLLEGE is also supported at the latest version!

Key Features:

Effortless Integration:
De-Anza-RMP effortlessly weaves into your Chrome browser, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free experience. Say goodbye to navigating external websites; now, professor ratings are conveniently available right on your registration page.

Informed Decision-Making:
Make well-informed decisions when selecting classes. With professor ratings at your fingertips, you gain valuable insights into teaching styles, difficulty levels, and overall student satisfaction. Empower yourself to choose the courses that align with your academic goals.

Streamlined Registration:
Save time and streamline your registration process. De-Anza-RMP eliminates the need to switch between tabs or visit external platforms to access professor ratings. All the information you need is now conveniently presented within your registration environment.

Enhanced User Experience:
Enjoy a more intuitive and user-friendly registration process. The extension is designed with a focus on user experience, ensuring that you have the tools you need to succeed at your fingertips.

Empowering Students:
De-Anza-RMP is more than just an extension; it's a tool for student empowerment. By providing quick access to professor ratings, the extension enables you to take an active role in shaping your academic experience.

Make the most of your academic journey with De-Anza-RMP â€“ where informed decisions meet seamless registration.

Note: De-Anza-RMP is compatible with Chromium based browsers, including Google Chrome, Brave, Arc, etc.
